_aChangeLog.text: added _fix at the end of the map name

November 19th 2021 update:  Fixed a skip where you could jump onto a prop and skip essentially half a level. I didn't think people would have enough speed to do it but it was possible. Fixed a skip where there was an invisible booster. I had one there originally but then never removed it properly. Thanks to Kris for pointing these out for me.

_sText:
Originally the map was going to be bhop_aurum2, hence why I used a similar style. However, I decided that I didn't feel like naming another map after myself lol. I was shooting for the map to be around 1:15 to 1:30 but it'll probably be closer to a 1 minute map. There is also a fairly basic bonus that should be around 10-15 seconds. 
Steam: https://steamcommunity.com/id/Valetorious/

If anybody wants to port to CSGO, feel free to. I would probably take this time to learn how to do it, but I'm away from home and using my wife's laptop which can't run CSGO. Bhop_astra still needs to be ported as well if anybody is interested in that.
